org.crosswire.common.diff
类 Bitap

java.lang.Object
  org.crosswire.common.diff.Bitap
所有已实现的接口：
Locator
public class Bitap
extends java.lang.Object
implements Locator

An implementation of the Bitap algorithm for finding a "fuzzy" location of a match. Based on the LGPL Diff_Match_Patch v1.5 javascript of Neil Fraser, Copyright (C) 2006
http://neil. fraser.name/software/diff_match_patch/

作者：
DM Smith [dmsmith555 at yahoo dot com]
另请参见：
for license details.
The copyright to this program is held by it's authors.

构造函数摘要
Bitap(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String pattern, int loc)
          Locate the best instance of 'pattern' in 'text' near 'loc'.

构造函数详细信息

Bitap

public Bitap(java.lang.String text,
             java.lang.String pattern,
             int loc)
Locate the best instance of 'pattern' in 'text' near 'loc'.

参数：
text - The text to search
pattern - The pattern to search for
loc - The location to search around
方法详细信息

maxPatternLength

public int maxPatternLength()
从接口 Locator 复制的描述
The maximum length a pattern can be.

指定者：
接口 Locator 中的 maxPatternLength
返回：
maximum pattern length.

locate

public int locate()
从接口 Locator 复制的描述
Locate the best match of a pattern in text near a supplied location.

指定者：
接口 Locator 中的 locate
返回：
Best match index or -1, if no match found
